oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.customization.menu.taskslist
Class TasksListMenu

java.lang.Object
  oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.customization.menu.taskslist.TasksListMenu

public class TasksListMenu
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides API for FUSE+ menu customization for Tasks List menus.

Method Detail

getCustClasses

public oracle.mds.cust.CustomizationClass[] getCustClasses()
Getter for the custClasses property. This custClasses property is used to set the customization level for the CRUD operation on this menu item. If it is not set the operation will use the tip level set in the MDSSession custConfig object.

Returns:

indent

public boolean indent(TasksListMenuBean bean)
Indent tasks list menu node under the previous sibling. The previous sibling will become the new parent.

Parameters:
bean - The node to be indented.
Returns:
success of operation.

unindent

public boolean unindent(TasksListMenuBean bean)
Unindent tasks list menu node under the parent node. The previous grandparent of this node, becomes the new parent node.

Parameters:
bean - The node to be unindented.
Returns:
success of operation.

moveUp

public boolean moveUp(TasksListMenuBean bean)
Move tasks list menu node up above the previous sibling node. This operation does not change the parent of the node.

Parameters:
bean - The node to be moved up.
Returns:
success of operation.

moveDown

public boolean moveDown(TasksListMenuBean bean)
Move tasks list menu node down below the next sibling node. This operation does not change the parent of the node.

Parameters:
bean - The node to be moved down.
Returns:
success of operation.

moveDrop

public boolean moveDrop(TasksListMenuBean dragTarget,
                        TasksListMenuBean dropTarget)
Move tasks list menu node down below the supplied node as its next sibling node. This operation will change the parent of the node to be the same as the supplied node.

Parameters:
dragTarget - The node that is being dragged from.
dropTarget - The node that is being dropped onto.
Returns:
success of operation.

isBaseMenu

public boolean isBaseMenu(TasksListMenuBean bean)
Determines whether the the current bean is part of the base document for the tasks list menu and is not created in a customization layer.

Returns:
whether current bean is part of the base document.
